definition: belligerence aroused by a real or supposed wrong, personified as one of the deadly sins
details:
noun
- belligerence aroused by a real or supposed wrong, personified as one of the deadly sins
= example: belligerence aroused by a real or supposed wrong, personified as one of the deadly sins
= synonyms: ire, ira, anger
- intense anger (usually on an epic scale)
